sentence.Network_en: In this view they were sedulously abetted by their mother, aunts and other elderly female relatives.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这方面,他们得到了他们的母亲, 婶婶以及其它年长的女亲戚们孜孜不倦的怂恿.

sentence.Network_en: The clerk laid the two sheets of paper alongside and sedulously compared their contents.
sentence.Network_cn: 那职员把两张纸并排放在前面,仔细比较.

sentence.Network_en: Do not use to give oneself more recollections sedulously so - called.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要用所谓的刻意来给自己更多的回忆.
